description.ko: ECHO-0는 소리와 시각 사이의 간극을 메우는 몰입형 디지털 경험입니다. 음향 주파수를 역동적인 3차원 빛의 구조로 변환하여, 관람객이 실시간으로 소리의 질감을 눈으로 확인할 수 있게 합니다.
description.en: ECHO-0 is an immersive digital experience that bridges the gap between sound and sight. It transforms acoustic frequencies into dynamic, three-dimensional light structures, allowing viewers to see the texture of sound in real-time.

prompt: A cinematic shot of a futuristic digital art installation called ECHO-0, featuring complex sound waves visualized as iridescent glowing ribbons of light and geometric particles, flowing through a dark minimalist architectural space, sharp focus, 8k resolution, volumetric lighting, synthwave aesthetic.
